revision.comment: add info about stock software and OpenWrt support
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R6800 |revision=v1 |series=AC1900 |asin=B06Y48QYCH;DE;,B06Y3T4CR5;UK;, |est_release_date=07/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |availability=Europe |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY316200344 |fcc_date=01/12/2017 |pcb_id=BZV00C-1.6MM |flags=256QAM, DFS (master), |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30UF1G18AC-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, JP1,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo;QPF4519;Q, QPF4519, 58CW;4; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot Version: 4.3.0.0;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36;;, |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3-stream [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] device (80MHz wide 5GHz channel), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3-stream [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] device (40MHz wide channel) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 Dual Band Gigabit WiFi Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R6800}} "BZV00C-1.6MM" and "1706" is silkscreened on the [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201706/08/170028beltcdmfelzcuoev.jpg board]. :OEM: [[SerComm]] DFS support was added in a C2PC request to the FCC on 10/30/2017. ===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r6800/ ''Netgear R6800 Nighthawk'' on '''OpenITforum'''] *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-109522-1-1.html ''Netgear R6800'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (PCB images) ===Boot log=== {{:Netgear R6800/Boot log}} ==Images== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/227-netgear-r6800/ ''Gallery'' on '''OpenITforum'''] __NOTOC__
